message: I understand you wanting to be fair, but the value of the money decreases for me each round.  This offer is fair considering the time pressure.
Considering the inflation, this is a more reasonable offer.
This offer is the very definition of fair. Take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, and the money is losing value for you. This is a good deal.
Alice, we're running out of time.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. This is a better deal than you'll get next round.
